description.raw:
How to test it:

1. Start recording:

        ign gazebo -v 4 rolling_shapes.sdf --record -r

1. Create a model:

        ign service -s /world/shapes/create --reqtype ignition.msgs.EntityFactory --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 300 --req 'sdf: ''"<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>''<sdf version=\"1.6\">''<model name=\"spawned_model\">''<link name=\"link\">''<visual name=\"visual\">''<geometry><sphere><radius>1.0</radius></sphere></geometry>''</visual>''<collision name=\"visual\">''<geometry><sphere><radius>1.0</radius></sphere></geometry>''</collision>''</link>''</model>''</sdf>" ''pose: {position: {z: 10}} ''name: "new_name" ''allow_renaming: true'

1. Remove a model:

        ign service -s /world/shapes/remove --reqtype ignition.msgs.Entity --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 300 --req 'name: "box" type: MODEL'

1. Close gazebo

1. Start playback:

        ign gazebo -v 4 -r --playback ~/.ignition/gazebo/log/<timestamp>

1. You should see the spawned model show up, and the deleted model disappear.

---

## Summary:

* Added convenient functions to ECM
* Fix displaying created / removed entities on the entity tree
* Publish state changes on a new topic `/world/<name>/changed_state`. This should eventually be consolidated with the `SceneBroadcaster`'s `/world/<name>/state`, which is being used by the GUI and has different scope and rate.

---

## TODO

* Done
